'''Outside the Canvas, Inside the Lens''' is a [[Recurring Event]] where players can take pictures under certain conditions for rewards.

==History==
{{Event History Table}}

==Gameplay Notes==
* For objectives that require characters from certain [[region]]s, characters only belong to the region shown in their [[Character Menu]]'s [[Vision]] case icon, regardless of any additional regions they are affiliated with in lore.
** For example, [[Thoma]] and [[Chiori]] use [[Inazuma]]n Vision cases and thus considered to be only from Inazuma, even though the former is originally from [[Mondstadt]] and the latter has settled in [[Fontaine]].
